comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: The school moved into their new building in October 1879. I don't think this building is still there. More history including a bombing in 1936 - www.charlestow-p.schools.nsw.edu.au/school.html#history

comment._content: @ State Records NSW - Is this only half of the document?

comment._content: Yes, it's just part of the plan. It was a previous digitisation order - other half wasn't requested. If I come across it, though, I'll add it here! Thanks for the adding the link.
